keyInsights.insight: 1 campaign(s) spent $2,819 with 0 conversions: 1090 | Search No Partners  | Rel 8 | CPC #2.
$2,693 spent on 186 zero-conversion search terms (84% of visible spend).
97 low-QS keywords costing ~$1,873/month in CPC premiums.
Only 10% Search Impression Share — missing 90% of eligible searches.

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 12 conversion actions (2x SUBMIT_LEAD_FORM, 1x DEFAULT, 1x ADD_TO_CART, 1x PAGE_VIEW, 1x CONVERTED_LEAD, 1x ENGAGEMENT, 1x UNKNOWN, 2x QUALIFIED_LEAD, 2x OUTBOUND_CLICK). Recording 16 conversions in 30d.

checks.name: Enhanced conversions
checks.finding: Enhanced conversions or offline import detected — recovers 5-15% of conversions lost to cookie restrictions.

checks.name: Server-side tracking
checks.finding: Server-side or offline conversion import active — bypasses ad blockers and browser restrictions.

checks.name: Conversion categories
checks.finding: 9 conversion categories: 2x SUBMIT_LEAD_FORM, 1x DEFAULT, 1x ADD_TO_CART, 1x PAGE_VIEW, 1x CONVERTED_LEAD, 1x ENGAGEMENT, 1x UNKNOWN, 2x QUALIFIED_LEAD, 2x OUTBOUND_CLICK.

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: 0 primary actions, all macro conversions. Smart Bidding is optimizing for real business outcomes.

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: Potential duplicates: 3x "lead" actions; 2x "form" actions; 2x "submit" actions. Duplicates inflate counts 2-3x and cause Smart Bidding to overbid.

checks.name: GA4 linked
checks.finding: No GA4 conversion actions found. Link GA4 for cross-device tracking and audience insights.

checks.name: Tags firing
checks.finding: 12 actions recording 16 conversions in 30d. Data is flowing.

checks.name: Search term waste
checks.finding: $2,693 spent on 186 zero-conversion search terms (84% of $3,221 visible search spend). Top waste: "bobtail insurance" $85, "ooida trucking insurance" $77, "commercial truck insurance" $53, "insurance for box truck" $51, "non trucking liability insurance" $41.

checks.name: Negative keyword lists
checks.finding: 4 list(s) with 11656 total negatives. Good coverage with themed lists.

checks.name: Account-level negatives
checks.finding: 11656 negative keywords across 4 lists. Ensure lists are attached to all active campaigns.

checks.name: Match type performance
checks.finding: No broad match keywords active. PHRASE: $4,067, 9 conv. EXACT: $3,353, 7 conv. BROAD: $0, 0 conv.

checks.name: Zero-conversion keywords
checks.finding: 15 keywords spent $2,412 with 0 conversions in 30d. Top waste: "how much does it cost to insure a semi truck" $306, "commercial insurance for hotshot trucking" $277, "commercial box truck insurance" $221, "semi truck insurance quotes" $194, "box truck insurance cost" $162.

checks.name: Campaign naming
checks.finding: 2 naming prefix(es) across 2 campaigns. Consistent naming convention.

checks.name: Ad group structure
checks.finding: 7 ad groups across 2 campaigns (avg 4/campaign).

checks.name: Single theme ad groups
checks.finding: 4 ad groups per campaign on average. Manageable structure.

checks.name: Campaign count
checks.finding: 2 campaigns: 1 DISPLAY, 1 SEARCH.

checks.name: Brand campaign
checks.finding: No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.

checks.name: PMax campaign
checks.finding: No active PMax. Consider launching with strong asset groups and audience signals.

checks.name: Search + PMax overlap
checks.finding: No concurrent Search + PMax.

checks.name: Budget allocation
checks.finding: 2 campaigns, $9,100/day budget, 10% Search Impression Share. Worst: 1090 | Search No Partners  | Rel 8 | CPC #2 (0x ROAS, $2,819). $2,819/month on below-1x-ROAS or zero-conversion campaigns.

checks.name: Budget utilization
checks.finding: $9,100/day budget, ~$247/day actual spend (3% utilization). Under-delivery — check targeting, bids, or Quality Score.

checks.name: Geographic targeting
checks.finding: Correctly using "Presence" targeting.

checks.name: Network settings
checks.finding: Search campaigns properly isolated from Display Network.

checks.name: Quality Score
checks.finding: Avg QS: 3.1/10 across 124 scored keywords (9 at 7+, 97 below 5). Est. CPC premium from low-QS keywords: ~$1,873/month. Top offenders: "box truck insurance cost" QS 3 ($830 spend, ~$266 premium), "commercial trucking insurance companies" QS 1 ($392 spend, ~$251 premium), "how much does it cost to insure a semi truck" QS 1 ($306 spend, ~$196 premium).

checks.name: Zero-impression keywords
checks.finding: 0 of 676 enabled keywords had 0 impressions in 30d.

checks.name: Keyword-to-ad relevance
checks.finding: Avg QS 3.1 indicates poor keyword-to-ad relevance. Tighten ad group themes and include keywords in headlines.

checks.name: RSA Ad Strength
checks.finding: 6 RSAs: 4 Good/Excellent, 2 need improvement (2 AVERAGE, 4 GOOD).

checks.name: PMax performance
checks.finding: No active PMax campaigns.

checks.name: CTR vs benchmark
checks.finding: Account CTR: 6.77%. Strong CTR.

checks.name: Smart bidding
checks.finding: Smart bidding active: MAXIMIZE_CONVERSIONS, TARGET_SPEND.

checks.name: Search impression share
checks.finding: 10% Search Impression Share — missing 90% of eligible searches. Increase budget on profitable campaigns or improve QS.

checks.name: Manual CPC justification
checks.finding: Using automated bidding.

checks.name: Sitelinks
checks.finding: 22 sitelink asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Callouts
checks.finding: 11 callout asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Structured snippets
checks.finding: 1 structured_snippet asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Image extensions
checks.finding: 171 image asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Call extensions
checks.finding: No call extensions configured.

checks.name: Remarketing audiences
checks.finding: 4 remarketing/audience list(s) configured.

checks.name: Customer Match
checks.finding: 2 Customer Match list(s) uploaded.

quickWins.action: Pause or restructure "1090 | Search No Partners  | Rel 8 | CPC #2" — 0x ROAS on $2,819, losing ~$2,819/month.
Evaluate "1090 | Search No Partners  | Rel 8 | CPC #2" — $2,819 spent with 0 conversions in 30d.
Add negatives for 10 zero-conversion search terms: "bobtail insurance", "ooida trucking insurance", "commercial truck insurance"... — $2,693 wasted.
Pause 15 zero-conversion keywords: "how much does it cost to insure a semi truck", "commercial insurance for hotshot trucking", "commercial box truck insurance"... — $2,412 wasted.
Improve 97 keywords with QS below 5 — est. $1,873/month CPC premium. Worst: "box truck insurance cost" QS 3.
Fix: No duplicate counting — Potential duplicates: 3x "lead" actions; 2x "form" actions; 2x "submit" actions. Duplicates inflate counts 2-3x and cause Smart Bidding to overbid.
Fix: Brand campaign — No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.

items: 1 campaign(s) spent $2,819 with 0 conversions: 1090 | Search No Partners  | Rel 8 | CPC #2. Evaluate conversion tracking, landing pages, and targeting.

$2,693 wasted on 186 zero-conversion search terms. Add top wasters as negatives: "bobtail insurance", "ooida trucking insurance", "commercial truck insurance", "insurance for box truck", "non trucking liability insurance".
97 keywords with QS below 5 are costing ~$1,873 extra/month in CPC premiums. Improve ad relevance and landing page alignment for these keywords.
Create a brand Search campaign to protect branded terms from competitors.
Pause or restructure 15 zero-conversion keywords to recover $2,412/month.
Increase Search Impression Share from 10% — you're missing 90% of potential customers.
